content.text:
I'm very interested in making posts better for everyone I'd love to see this implemented.

I think that eventually we'll need a more user-friendly editor, and having the image upload prompt for alt text is a feature I'll keep near the top of my priority list. As a tangent, I know that [@blaine](@OF30xmIi8yCA6nLuu8UtCxy+LAzRJ3yzH/s6Ia6ejGs=.ed25519) talked about markup that's better than Markdown, but I wasn't able to attend the session (cc: [@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519), I think you mentioned this in the closing circle?).
